title: A part of my LoL client is gone!
body: you know the section where you login? well if i click anywhere but there, it disappears! And that section is also where you can see your friends! ;-; ( if you could help me i'd be eternally grateful! )

replies.body: Your patcher might be scaled too high.  What happens if you tap Ctrl + Down Arrow, or Ctrl and -?  Let me know if that does the trick!
Thx so so so much! it actually worked! also LoL's "Remember me" option might work now... if not then i'll let you know about that to. but for now, gotta {{summoner:4}} to the real world!
what does remember me do anyways?
